channel.title: For babies on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in For babies on Game6r

item.title: Gingerbread Man and Candies game
item.description: In this game, together with a funny kolobok, you go on an exciting journey through a fabulous galaxy. Help the brave hero collect the maximum amount of sweets at each of the game stages. Also, don’t forget to get to the key, with which you can open the portal to the next location.

item.title: Mixed World
item.description: Assemble the pyramid in the correct order! Just put multi-colored rings on the column in such a way that they are arranged in order of decreasing size. The largest ring should be at the bottom. If you suddenly take an inappropriate element, then it simply will not be put on the column.

item.title: Puzzle game for kids 4 years old
item.description: In this game, you will be asked to put together a puzzle dedicated to the animated series about SpongeBob. A set of mixed up pieces will be displayed on the screen, and you need to assemble a full-fledged image from them. To do this, swap any elements in places until they all fall into the positions intended for them.
